\begin{document}
\textbf{Take Home Quiz 4}

Official name (printed):\bigskip{}

\newpage

1.  Find the antiderivative of each of the following functions. 

a) $\displaystyle f(x) = x^2 + 2$

\vspace{1.5in}

b)  $\displaystyle f(x) = 2 \cos(x)$

\vspace{1.5in}

c)  $\displaystyle f(x) = e^x + \frac{1}{x^2}$

\vspace{2in}

d)  $\displaystyle f(x) = \frac{3}{x}$

\newpage

2. Suppose $f''(x) = 6x + 2$, $f(0) = 3$, and $f(1) = 5$.  Find $f(x)$.
\vspace{3.5in}


3.  Use a right Riemann sum with 5 intervals to estimate
$$\int_0^{5 \pi/4} 2 \sin(x)$$
\end{document}
